definition: to put an end to/to annihilate/to cause to perish/to perish/annihilation (in quantum field theory)
to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: Most were wiped out by a disease known as Chytrid fungus.
sentences.chinese: 大部分被消灭了被称为壶菌的一种疾病。

sentences.english: Exertion of the right of rescission is necessary to rescind a contract.
sentences.chinese: 第三，解除权的行使与消灭。

sentences.english: Sprinkling coffee grounds around your garden eliminates cutworms and ants.
sentences.chinese: 将咖啡渣撒在你的花园里可以消灭夜蛾和蚂蚁。

sentences.english: Nirodha extinguishes all forms of clinging and attachment.
sentences.chinese: 灭消灭一切形式的执着和依恋。

sentences.english: Description: This is the reductor curse, it will blast apart a solid object.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个消灭还原诅咒，可以把一个固体物件炸开。

sentences.english: But the fact is, they are completely wiped out by the Japanese Navy within less than one month.
sentences.chinese: 但结果呢，他们不到一个月就被日本海军给消灭了。

sentences.english: Let us use it to end AIDS – once and for all.
sentences.chinese: 让我们借此势头，去消灭艾滋病，将它斩草除根。

sentences.english: You need a budget. Eliminate ALL the nonessential costs in your life.
sentences.chinese: 消灭生活中所有不重要的开支。

sentences.english: O God Siva, this woman must be eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 唵，顶礼湿婆，这个女人是一定要被消灭的。

sentences.english: Once Mao had achieved victory and eliminated his enemies, what was there left for him to do?
sentences.chinese: 当毛取得胜利消灭敌人后，他应该做什么？

sentences.english: But curing the disease does not mean eliminating the mutation.
sentences.chinese: 不过治疗该疾病并不意味着消灭这种突变。

sentences.english: This new insecticide kills out most of the pests.
sentences.chinese: 这种新杀虫剂消灭了大部分害虫。

sentences.english: He tried to devise a foolproof plan for getting rid of termites.
sentences.chinese: 没有一种绝对可靠的方法消灭夏天的蝇虫。

sentences.english: I remember that for one hundred years, they have set their armies to destroy us.
sentences.chinese: 我记得这百余年来它们不停地派军队来企图消灭我们。

sentences.english: The Soviet commitment to the destruction of capitalism is not purely ritualistic and proforma.
sentences.chinese: 苏联声称要消灭资本主义不仅仅是形式上的。

definition: to root out/to eradicate/to sweep away/to abolish
to clear away/to eliminate/to get rid of
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
